column1: Pulmonary hypertension (PAH) is abnormally high blood pressure in the arteries of the lungs.
- Tell your doctor if you are becoming dizzy or have a lot more swelling in your legs.

Your hospital health care provider may ask you to make a follow-up visit with: - Your primary care doctor - Your lung doctor (pulmonologist) or your heart doctor (cardiologist) - Someone who can help you stop smoking, if you smoke
